A tiny demo dataset for quick-start examples

Source: R/demo.R
demo.Rd

demo is a small Seurat object derived from the package's internal example dataset mini_mac, reduced to a small number of genes for fast examples in the quick start in README.

Usage

data(demo)

Format

A Seurat object with:

assays$RNA

counts and data matrices with ~200 genes

meta.data

columns such as Sample_type, Treatment_1, Concentration_1

Details

The object is created in data-raw/demo.R and saved with usethis::use_data(demo, compress = "xz").

See also

mini_mac

On this page
